Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • sysc3110_project.Document
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable, java.io.Serializable
    This class is part of the File Sharing Network Project. This Document class creates instances of documents for the Network
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Mohamed Dahrouj, Lava Tahir, Ali Farah, Zening Jiang
    See Also:
